input.sentences: i always enjoy going to a jobs seminar in my town .
this year the seminar had a guest speaker .
his presentation was wonderful and the screen behind him included a lot of great information .
the speaker was very motivating and he inspired the audience to find better jobs .
at the end of his presentation he answered questions and everybody left the seminar feeling very satisfied
output.sentences: There is a town meeting today.
They have a special guest speaker
He has a power point presentation for us to view
After the presentation he will speak for another hour
He quickly answers the audience members questions
